mapper.sql: A.id AS id,A.parent_id AS parentId,A.code AS code,A.code_name AS codeName,A.parent_code AS parentCode,A.dict_name AS dictName,A.dict_value AS dictValue,A.dict_type AS dictType,A.dict_level AS dictLevel,A.second_value AS secondValue,A.dict_desc AS dictDesc,A.is_leaf AS isLeaf,A.authority AS authority,A.expandable AS expandable,A.serial AS serial,A.type_id AS typeId,A.link_id AS linkId,A.group_id AS groupId,A.grade_id AS gradeId,A.main_status AS mainStatus,A.logic_status AS logicStatus,A.attr_decimal AS attrDecimal,A.attr_str AS attrStr,A.attr_int AS attrInt,A.sequence AS sequence,A.remark AS remark,A.deleted_at AS deletedAt,A.deleted_by AS deletedBy,A.created_at AS createdAt,A.created_by AS createdBy,A.updated_at AS updatedAt,A.updated_by AS updatedBy

sql.if: AND (A.authority IS NULL OR A.authority = 1 OR A.authority = 2)

mapper.sql: LEFT JOIN dict d2 ON A.parent_code = d2.code
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM A
WHERE A.serial = #{serial,jdbcType=VARCHAR} LIMIT 0,1
